name: Brutal Doom: Power Fantasy
summary: Brutal Doom Power Fantasy gives most guns a new look as well as increased base damage to say "Hey, you don't need the upgrades to kill things." A few weapons have been removed for reasons from too much sprite work (chainsaw with the blood colors) or just simply no feasible upgrade (flamethrower) while the grenade is now a Big Fucking Grenade. A few monsters from the XMVE expansion have been included to provide a bit of extra challenge. Upgrades also consume twice the ammo.
